DOC.brief_summary: This study is aimed to assess the prevalence of thiamin deficiency in obese Thai children.
DOC.brief_title: Thiamin Deficiency in Obese Thai Children
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a cross-sectional study. The objectives of the study are to determine the prevalence of thiamin deficiency in obese Thai children and to assess the associations of dietary factors and thiamin deficiency.
DOC.criteria: obese : weight for height > median + 3 standard deviations simple obesity pathological obesity chronic diseases e.g. cerebral palsy, metabolic disease, etc. diseases of red blood cells on medication e.g. steroid, multivitamins, thiaminecontaining vitamins, diuretic drugs hemodialysis or peritoneal dialysis bariatric surgery
